name: Yash Khara
headline: Marketing Manager
summary: I am a seasoned marketing professional with a passion for driving growth and innovation. With a strong foundation in digital marketing and a keen eye for data-driven strategies, I have successfully led campaigns that have exceeded targets and delivered measurable results.

education.university: West Bengal University of Technology, Kolkata

experience.title: Digital Marketing Manager
description: • Led the digital marketing team in developing and executing comprehensive digital marketing strategies to drive growth and increase brand awareness.
• Successfully implemented SEM, and social media campaigns that resulted in a 25% increase in website traffic and a 30% boost in conversion rates.
• Managed the company's social media accounts and created engaging content to increase brand awareness and drive traffic to the website.
• Conducted A/B testing to optimize landing pages and improve user engagement.
• Collaborated with the sales team to develop targeted email campaigns and nurture leads through the sales funnel.
• Analyzed website and campaign analytics to identify trends and optimize marketing strategies.

experience.title: Sr. Associate Digital Marketing
description: • Launched spearhead campaigns for the company's product launch in new markets and increased the company's lead generation by 4.8x.
• Optimized targeting strategies through data-driven bidding and audience segmentation to achieve 60% reduction in cost per conversion.
• Managed the company's CRM system to ensure seamless integration of marketing and sales data.
• Exceeded campaign performance goals consistently while managing a monthly budget of $100,000.
• Developed and executed email campaigns that resulted in a 20% increase in open rates and a 15% boost in click-through rates.
• Received *Employee of the Year* recognition for consistently exceeding campaign performance goals and driving significant ROI.

experience.title: Digital Marketing Analyst
description: • Successfully implemented hyperlocal campaigns for the company's flagship product and increased the company's lead inflow by 7x.
• Developed and executed Google campaigns along with several SMM campaign on Facebook, LinkedIn & Quora that resulted in 10x increase in brand awareness.
• Improved the company's market placement and messaging which resulted in 50% reduction in cost per lead.

experience.title: Seo Intern
description: • Conducted extensive keyword research and SEO optimizations to boost organic search rankings on SERP.
• Produced engaging blog posts and social media content, which increased audience engagement on website.
• Led a team of 10 content creators, ensuring efficient content production and strategic publication.

awards.title: Employee of the Year
awards.description: Received *Employee of the Year* recognition for consistently exceeding campaign performance goals and driving significant ROI.
